org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.impl

Class DTStatsAggregator

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.impl.DTStatsAggregator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DTStatsAggregator
extends Object
implements scala.Serializable
    DecisionTree statistics aggregator for a node. This holds a flat array of statistics for a set of (features, bins) and helps with indexing. This class is abstract to support learning with and without feature subsampling.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • metadata

        public DecisionTreeMetadata metadata()

      • impurityAggregator

        public ImpurityAggregator impurityAggregator()
        ImpurityAggregator instance specifying the impurity type.

      • getImpurityCalculator

        public ImpurityCalculator getImpurityCalculator(int featureOffset,
                                       int binIndex)
        Get an ImpurityCalculator for a given (node, feature, bin).
        Parameters:
        featureOffset - For ordered features, this is a pre-computed (node, feature) offset from getFeatureOffset. For unordered features, this is a pre-computed (node, feature, left/right child) offset from getLeftRightFeatureOffsets.

      • update

        public void update(int featureIndex,
          int binIndex,
          double label,
          double instanceWeight)
        Update the stats for a given (feature, bin) for ordered features, using the given label.

      • featureUpdate

        public void featureUpdate(int featureOffset,
                 int binIndex,
                 double label,
                 double instanceWeight)
        Faster version of update. Update the stats for a given (feature, bin), using the given label.
        Parameters:
        featureOffset - For ordered features, this is a pre-computed feature offset from getFeatureOffset. For unordered features, this is a pre-computed (feature, left/right child) offset from getLeftRightFeatureOffsets.

      • getFeatureOffset

        public int getFeatureOffset(int featureIndex)
        Pre-compute feature offset for use with featureUpdate. For ordered features only.

      • getLeftRightFeatureOffsets

        public scala.Tuple2<Object,Object> getLeftRightFeatureOffsets(int featureIndex)
        Pre-compute feature offset for use with featureUpdate. For unordered features only.

      • mergeForFeature

        public void mergeForFeature(int featureOffset,
                   int binIndex,
                   int otherBinIndex)
        For a given feature, merge the stats for two bins.
        Parameters:
        featureOffset - For ordered features, this is a pre-computed feature offset from getFeatureOffset. For unordered features, this is a pre-computed (feature, left/right child) offset from getLeftRightFeatureOffsets.
        binIndex - The other bin is merged into this bin.
        otherBinIndex - This bin is not modified.

      • merge

        public DTStatsAggregator merge(DTStatsAggregator other)
        Merge this aggregator with another, and returns this aggregator. This method modifies this aggregator in-place.
